price: ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲߬ ߊ߬ߦߌ߫ ߸ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߵߊߟߎ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߞߏߕߌ߮ ߘߌ߫، ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߘߏ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߘߍ߬ߡߍ߲߬ߠߌ߲߬ߠߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߢߌ߬ߡߊ ߘߌ߫
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلنَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: bali al-lahu mawlākum wahuwa khayru al-nāṣirīna
